titles.title: A bill to authorize additional judgeships for the middle district and southern district of Florida.
A bill to authorize additional judgeships for the middle district and southern district of Florida.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: Directs the President to appoint five additional U.S. district judges for the middle district of Florida, including one temporary judge, and three additional U.S. district judges for the southern district of Florida.
